EmailTemplate.name: AR Application Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Application submitted for {!ar_Application__c.Company_Name__c} - {!ar_Application__c.D_B_Duns_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ar_Application__c.First_Name__c},
Thank you for submitting the application to be part of the Unilever Agency Roster program.
Our procurement team will review your company's details in next few weeks.
We endeavor to get back to you as soon as possible.
Kind regards Unilever Agency Roster Team
